H0.text: Weighing-in at up 48 stone, who wrestled under the ring-name Giant Haystacks. William Joyce

H1.text: Weighing-in at up 48 stone, who wrestled under the ring-name Giant Haystacks. Shirley Crabtree

H2.text: Weighing-in at up 48 stone, who wrestled under the ring-name Giant Haystacks. Steve Dunn

H3.text: Weighing-in at up 48 stone, who wrestled under the ring-name Giant Haystacks. Martin Ruane

A4.text: Shirley Crabtree Jr. (14 November 1930 â€“ 2 December 1997), better known as Big Daddy

A5.text: He was known for his massive physical size, billed as standing 6 ft 11 inch (2.11 m) tall and weighing from 31 stone (430 lb; 200 kg) at the beginning of his career to 48 stone (670 lb; 300 kg) by the end of it; at his heaviest, he weighed 49 stone 13 pounds (699 lb; 317 kg).
